Flub.Name: Power
Flub.Description: The strength of the blur. For optimal speed, use high power and low iterations. Although you may see square artifacts with too high values.

Flub.Name: Iterations
Flub.Description: The number of blur iterations to be repeated. For best quality, use low power and at least 4 iterations.

Flub.Name: Sigma
Flub.Description: The sigma or radius of the Gaussian blur. (Only available for Gaussian Blur)

Flub.Name: Direction
Flub.Description: The direction of the motion blur. (Only available for Motion Blur)
